text: Rounding. The Delivery Amount and the Return Amount will be rounded to the nearest integral multiple o f EUR 100,000; provided that if an amount corresponds to the exact half o f such multiple, then it will be rounded up; and provided further that, for the purpose o f the calculation o f the Return Amount where a party's Credit Support Amount is, or is deemed to be, zero, the Return Amount shall not be rounded.

Rounding. The Delivery Amount and the Return Amount will be rounded to the nearest integral multiple of USD 10,000 provided that if an amount corresponds to the exact half of such multiple, then it will be rounded up; and provided further that, for the purpose of the calculation of the Return Amount where a party's Credit Support Amount is, or is deemed to be, zero, the Return Amount shall not be rounded.
"Rounding". The Delivery Amount will be rounded up to the nearest integral multiple of GBP 10,000 and the Return Amount will be rounded down to the nearest integral multiple of GBP 10,000.
The Delivery Amount will be rounded up to the nearest integral multiple of INR 20,000 and the Return Amount will be rounded down to the nearest integral multiple of GBP 10,000.
The Return Amount will be rounded up to the nearest integral multiple of INR 20,000 and the Delivery Amount will be rounded down to the nearest integral multiple of GBP 10,000.
The Delivery and the Return Amount amount will be rounded up to the nearest integral multiple of INR 20,000.
